title: Cross-Platform Testing & Q3 Release
goal: Comprehensive cross-platform testing, bug fixes, and Q3 release preparation

tasks.title: Set up cross-platform CI/CD matrix
tasks.description: Configure GitHub Actions matrix to build and test on Windows, macOS (Intel + Apple Silicon), and Linux distributions
acceptanceCriteria: Artifacts are uploaded for each platform

tasks.title: Create cross-platform E2E test suite
tasks.description: Develop comprehensive E2E tests that verify core functionality works identically across all platforms
acceptanceCriteria: Core features are tested on all platforms

tasks.title: Perform installer testing across platforms
tasks.description: Test all installer formats (NSIS, MSI, MSIX, DMG, PKG, AppImage, deb, rpm, snap) on fresh systems

tasks.title: Test auto-update across platforms
tasks.description: Verify auto-update functionality works correctly on all platforms including signature verification and delta updates

tasks.title: Perform visual regression testing
tasks.description: Run visual regression tests comparing UI rendering across platforms to ensure consistent appearance

tasks.title: Test platform-specific features
tasks.description: Verify all platform-specific features work correctly including Touch Bar, Jump Lists, and taskbar integration

tasks.title: Perform accessibility audit on all platforms
tasks.description: Test accessibility features with screen readers on each platform (VoiceOver, Narrator, Orca)
acceptanceCriteria: Keyboard navigation works on all platforms

tasks.title: Fix platform-specific bugs
tasks.description: Address bugs discovered during cross-platform testing including rendering issues, keyboard shortcuts, and native integrations

tasks.title: Optimize performance across platforms
tasks.description: Profile and optimize performance on each platform to ensure consistent responsiveness and memory usage
acceptanceCriteria: PDF rendering is smooth on all platforms
Memory usage is within acceptable limits
No platform has significantly worse performance

tasks.title: Prepare release notes for Q3
tasks.description: Write comprehensive release notes documenting all Q3 features, improvements, bug fixes, and known issues

tasks.title: Create release candidates
tasks.description: Build and publish release candidates for all platforms for final testing and community feedback
acceptanceCriteria: RC builds are created for all platforms
RCs are published to pre-release channel

tasks.title: Publish Q3 release
tasks.description: Build and publish final Q3 release to all distribution channels including GitHub, Microsoft Store, and package repositories
acceptanceCriteria: Installers are uploaded to GitHub Releases
MSIX is submitted to Microsoft Store

tasks.title: Update platform documentation
tasks.description: Update all platform-specific documentation with Q3 changes including installation guides and feature documentation

tasks.title: Monitor release metrics
tasks.description: Set up monitoring for release metrics including download counts, crash reports, and user feedback across platforms
acceptanceCriteria: Download counts are tracked per platform
Alerts are set for critical issues

successCriteria: All installers work on fresh systems
Q3 release is published to all channels
dependencies: Access to all target platforms for testing
notes: Focus on stability over new features this sprint
Coordinate release timing across all channels
Have rollback plan ready for critical issues
Monitor closely for first 48 hours after release
